author: JamesWTruher

comments.author: zach-folwick
comments.body: Do we actually create 26 additional drives??  I thought I'd seen code in there that enumerated additional drives, but didn't think we actually went to the trouble of creating them.

comments.author: JamesWTruher
comments.body:
no, we don't create the drives, only the functions
line 5450 in InitialSessionState.cs

title: we should not create the drive letter aliases on Linux
